page.title: 04 THE RIVERSIDE PRESS
page.content: The Riverside Press factory employs about 50 people and is in Whiddon Valley, Barnstaple. It has a lot of machines.It also has a lot of paper because they make about 2,000 magazines an hour. They use fork-lift trucks to carry the post in. There are several different rooms for different processes, and they even make their own staples for the magazines. The firm makes different types of magazines, for example pop, football, video, computer etc. Some magazines are sent to be sold in shops, others are sent through the post to buyers. The factory was very noisy. We all had to wear earplugs to protect our ears.It was quite clean and apart from the noise it would be a good place to work. Scott Pickard & Kelly Lane
